title: DataApp-Provider
description: A simple data provider app to test IDS connector data flow. This app generates a random message and provides a JSON message output

title: DataApp-Consumer
description: A simple data consumer app to test IDS connector data flow. This app just stores the message received in in-memory cache and returns unique id of the stored reference

title: DataApp-Processor
description: A simple data processor app to test IDS connector data flow. This app just adds an attribute to indicate that the data passed through it

title: DataApp-Auditor
description: A simple data auditor app to test IDS connector data flow. This app just adds an attribute to indicate that the data passed through it

title: DataApp-Encryptor
description: A simple data encryptor app to test IDS connector data flow. This app just adds an attribute to indicate that the data passed through it

title: DataApp-Validator
description: A simple data validator app to test IDS connector data flow. This app just adds an attribute to indicate that the data passed through it

title: DataApp-Generic
description: A simple data app to test IDS connector data flow. This app can be used as a provider, consumer and processor
